column2: "EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio
column3: dɛ
column6: ka kyerɛ Taere mampanyin no dɛ
column7: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ ama w'akoma do
column12: naaso eyɛ nyimpa na ennyɛ nyame bi
column13: kaansa eyɛɛ w'akoma dɛ nyame akoma mpo a."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: eyɛ nyansafo sen Daniel; esumadze biara nnyi hɔ a wobotum wɔdze esuma wo:"

column2: "ɔnam wo nyansaa na wo ntseasee do na enya woho
column3: na enya sika na dwetɛ egu w'adzekoradze mu."

column2: "Ɔnam wo nyansaa dodow wɔ eguadzi mu na ama w'ahonya adɔɔ so
column3: na ama w'akoma do wɔ w'ahonya ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ ayɛ w'akoma dɛ nyame akoma;"
"ntsi hwɛ
column3: medze ananaben mebɛba wo do
column4: amanaman mu etsiɔdzenfo no a: na wɔbɔtwetwe hɔn mfona wɔ wo nyansaa ne fɛw do
column5: na woegu wo hyerɛn ho fi."

column2: "Wɔdze wo besian akɔ mona no mu; na ibowu atɔfo wu wɔ po finimfin."
"Aso ebɛda ho aka dɛ
column3: Meyɛ nyame
column4: wɔ nyia oku wo no enyim
column7: wɔ nyia opira wo no ne nsamu?"

column2: "Ibowu monomonomfo wu wɔ ananaben nsamu: na emi na maka
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Bio so EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column6: ma sukwadwom do wɔ Taerehen ho
column8: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nyi yi: Ɔwo dze
column9: nsɔwano nkaba a ɔso pɛ nye wo
column11: na idzi mu wɔ ahoɔfɛw mu."

column2: "Ɔwo nkyɛ ewɔ Nyame no ture Eden mu; aboɔdzembo biara yɛɛ w'akataho
column3: bɔgyanambo
column11: na ahabanmomonbo wɔyɛɛ sika edwindze maa wo: na w'ahosiesiedze. Da a wɔbɔɔ wo no na wosiesiee hɔn."

column2: "Ɔwo na eyɛɛ kerub a wɔasera no no a ɔkata do no: na medze wo sii hɔ
column3: ma ebɛtsenaa Nyame bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no no do; gya abo no ntamu na enantsewee dzii fowsian."

column2: "Idzii mu wɔ w'akwan mu fi da a wɔbɔɔ wo araa dze kodur dɛ wohun ɔbrakyew wɔ wo mu."
"W'eguadze dodow ntsi wɔdze emimdzi hyɛɛ wo mu ma
column3: na eyɛɛ bɔn: dɛm ntsi na motoow wo kyeen dɛ atantandze fii Nyame bepɔw no do; na Kerub a ɔweɔn wo no paam wo fii gya abo no ntamu."

column2: "Emaa w'akoma do wɔ w'ahoɔfɛw ntsi
column3: edze wo hyerɛn ama wo nyansaa aprɔw: matow wo akyen famu

column2: "W'emumuyɛ no dodow ntsi
column3: w'eguadzi mu brakyew ntsi
column4: egu wo krɔnkrɔnmbea ho fi; dɛm ntsi na mama gya fir wo mu efir edzi
column6: na madan wo nso wɔ asaase do wɔ hɔn a wɔhwɛ wo nyina enyiwa do."

column2: "Hɔn a wonyim wo aman mu nyina ho bɔbow hɔn wɔ wo ho: w'ewiei adan ehudze
column3: na erenntsena hɔ ara bio da."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ

column2: "Onyimpa ba
column3: fa w'enyi si Sidon do
column7: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: O Sidon
column8: menye wo enya; na wɔbɛhyɛ me enyimnyam wɔ wo mu. Wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column9: ber a mewie no mu atsɛmbudze yɛ
column10: na masan moho wɔ no mu."

column2: "Na mobɔsoma yardɔm akɔ no mu
column3: na bɔgya akɔ n'abrɔn mu; na ewufo bɔtotɔ famu wɔ no mu
column4: wɔ afona a ofi mbeambea bɛba no do no ano; na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na nsoɛ a ɔwɔ
column3: anaa hwirom a ano yɛ yaw
column4: rimmfi hɔn a woetwa hɔn ho ehyia a wobu hɔn enyimtsia no mu nnko hɔ mma Israel fie bio; na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Sɛ minya boa Israel fie ano aman a wɔapetse mu no mu
column3: na mo ho san wɔ hɔn mu wɔ amanaman enyim a
column4: nna wɔbɛtsena hɔnankasa hɔn asaase a medze maa m'akowaa Jakob no mu."

column2: "Na wɔbɛtsena do dwudwoodwo; nyew
column3: wobesisi adan
column5: na wɔatsena dwudwoodwo; sɛ minya yɛ atsɛmbudze wɔ hɔn a wobu hɔn enyimtsia bɔ hɔn ho aprɔw nyina do a; na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn."
